    def common_test_logic(self, use_case, user_question, test_case, expected_json):
        # time.sleep(30)
        # Get the response JSON from the API call
        response = self.api_helper.get_response_json(user_question, test_case)
    
        # Assert on the response code
        assert response.status_code == 200, f"Expected 200, got {response.status_code}. JEEVES_WORKFLOW_ID: {response.headers.get('jeeves-wf-id')}"
    
        response_json = response.json()
        jeeves_wf_id = response.headers.get('jeeves-wf-id', 'Unknown')
    
        # Extract the 'common_json' field from the response
        common_json = ConversationAPIHelper.get(response_json, 'common_json')
        # Fail the test if common_json is empty
        assert common_json, f"common_json is empty. Probably a multi-turn use-case. JEEVES_WORKFLOW_ID: {jeeves_wf_id}"
    
        # Extract the 'query' field from the common_json, if it is present
        actual_json = ConversationAPIHelper.get(common_json, 'query')
    
        # Validate the actual JSON with the expected JSON
        result = validate_jsons(expected_json, actual_json if actual_json else common_json)
    
        allure.dynamic.title(f"Test Case {test_case} - {use_case}")
    
        # Assert the validation result
